msContents.summary: A list of toponyms of agricultural plots, many in Arabic. After the toponym, the type of land is given as either a grainﬁeld or a vineyard, followed by the letter alpha, beta, or gamma, the land’s quality-class.

msItemStruct.note: Written transversa charta along the ﬁbers. Only the beginnings of the lines with the left margin (1.5 cm) are extant. Text on both sides.
